# `.clangd` Configuration File

Here's a neat `.clangd` configuration file with formatting options and other useful settings:

```yaml
# .clangd file

# Diagnostics configuration
Diagnostics:
  ClangTidy:
    Add: [
      "modernize*",
      "performance*",
      "bugprone*",
      "readability*",
      "portability*",
    ]
    Remove: [
      "modernize-use-trailing-return-type",
      "readability-braces-around-statements",
      "readability-magic-numbers",
    ]
    CheckOptions:
      readability-identifier-naming.VariableCase: camelBack
      readability-identifier-naming.FunctionCase: camelBack
      readability-identifier-naming.ClassCase: CamelCase
      readability-identifier-naming.EnumCase: CamelCase
      readability-identifier-naming.MemberCase: camelBack
      readability-identifier-naming.ParameterCase: camelBack

# Formatting configuration
Style:
  # Base style (LLVM, Google, Chromium, Mozilla, WebKit, Microsoft, GNU)
  BasedOnStyle: Google
  # Column limit
  ColumnLimit: 100
  # Indent width
  IndentWidth: 2
  # Tab width
  TabWidth: 2
  # Use tabs instead of spaces
  UseTab: Never
  # Indent case labels
  IndentCaseLabels: true
  # Namespace indentation
  NamespaceIndentation: None
  # Align consecutive assignments
  AlignConsecutiveAssignments: false
  # Align consecutive declarations
  AlignConsecutiveDeclarations: false
  # Align trailing comments
  AlignTrailingComments: true
  # Allow short if statements to be on a single line
  AllowShortIfStatementsOnASingleLine: false
  # Allow short loops to be on a single line
  AllowShortLoopsOnASingleLine: false
  # Allow short functions to be on a single line
  AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: Empty
  # Break before braces (Attach, Linux, Mozilla, Stroustrup, Allman, GNU)
  BreakBeforeBraces: Attach
  # Pointer alignment (Left, Right, Middle)
  PointerAlignment: Left
  # Space after template keyword
  SpaceAfterTemplateKeyword: true
  # Space before assignment operators
  SpaceBeforeAssignmentOperators: true
  # Space before parentheses
  SpaceBeforeParens: ControlStatements
  # Space inside empty parentheses
  SpaceInEmptyParentheses: false
  # Spaces inside parentheses
  SpacesInParentheses: false
  # Spaces inside square brackets
  SpacesInSquareBrackets: false
  # Spaces inside angular brackets
  SpacesInAngles: false

# Include sorting
CompileFlags:
  Add: [-Wall, -Wextra, -Wpedantic, -std=c++17]
  Remove: [-Werror]

# Completion options
Completion:
  AllScopes: true

# Include cleaner options
Index:
  Background: Build
  StandardLibrary: Yes

# Hover display options
Hover:
  ShowAKA: true

# Function arguments options
InlayHints:
  Enabled: Yes
  ParameterNames: Yes
  DeducedTypes: Yes
  Designators: Yes

# File management
Files:
  # Exclude directories and files from indexing
  Exclude:
    - .git/**
    - build/**
    - node_modules/**
    - dist/**
```

This configuration provides:
1. ClangTidy diagnostics with selective rule sets
2. Google-style code formatting with customizations
3. Compiler flags for better warnings
4. Improved completion with access to all scopes
5. Background indexing with standard library support
6. Enhanced hover and inlay hint features
7. Exclusion of common directories from indexing

You can customize this further based on your specific needs and preferences.
